item.title: 根据哥白尼的一份新报告，地球已连续九个月打破最热月记录。全球大部分海洋的海面温度仍处于前所未有的水平。
item.description:
Planet Earth has now broken warmest-month records for nine months in a row, according to a new report by Copernicus.

Global sea surface temperatures across a majority of the world’s oceans remain at unprecedented levels.https://t.co/zmcDBpGr14 pic.twitter.com/HD5xrR2l6q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）周三表示，纽约国民警卫队和纽约州警察将被部署到纽约市地铁系统，以帮助乘客在交通犯罪激增后获得安全感。
item.description:
New York National Guard troops and New York State Police troopers will be deployed into the NYC subway system to help riders feel safe after a spike in transit crime, Gov. Kathy Hochul said Wednesday. https://t.co/xgIVOxepjZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: "拜登总统在周三的一份声明中说："唐纳德-特朗普明确表示，他不想要尼基-海利的支持者。"拜登总统在周三的声明中说："我想明确一点：他们在我的竞选活动中占有一席之地。
item.description:
"Donald Trump made it clear he doesn't want Nikki Haley's supporters," Pres. Biden said in a statement on Wednesday. "I want to be clear: There is a place for them in my campaign." https://t.co/uCUzDlxsZZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 研究人员说，最近在马萨诸塞州的南塔克特岛海岸发现了一头灰鲸，该物种被认为在大西洋灭绝已有 200 年之久。
item.description:
A gray whale, whose species has been considered extinct in the Atlantic Ocean for 200 years, was recently spotted off the coast of Nantucket, an Island in Massachusetts, researchers say. https://t.co/rhOdGR5jWY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据美国国家运输安全委员会（National Transportation Safety Board）的一名官员称，周一晚上，一架单引擎飞机在飞行员报告发动机完全失去动力后坠毁在田纳西州纳什维尔的一条高速公路上，造成包括三名儿童在内的五人死亡。
item.description:
Five people, including three children, died when a single-engine plane crashed into a Nashville, Tennessee, highway after the pilot reported a total loss of engine power on Monday night, according to a National Transportation Safety Board official.https://t.co/flDXjJTyh7 pic.twitter.com/FxdBxocmpJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在高等法院裁定胚胎是儿童的几周后，阿拉巴马州州长签署了一项允许恢复试管婴儿治疗的法案，使其成为法律。

item.title: 一架配备降落伞的小型飞机坠毁在华盛顿州贝尔维尤的一个社区。官方称飞机起飞后不久因引擎故障坠毁，机上无人受伤。
item.description:
A small plane equipped with a parachute crashed into a neighborhood in Bellevue, Washington. Officials say the plane went down shortly after takeoff due to an engine failure.

No one onboard was injured. https://t.co/ibUBlTZUmg pic.twitter.com/bEIs5Bl0vj

item.title: 美国官员说，胡塞武装分子周三在一艘货轮上杀害了三名平民，这是该组织为抗议以色列对哈马斯发动战争而开始对主要航道发动一系列袭击以来首次对商船进行致命袭击。
item.description:
Houthi militants killed three civilians aboard a cargo carrier on Wednesday, the group's first fatal strike on a commercial vessel since it began a string of attacks on key shipping lanes in protest of Israel's war against Hamas, U.S. officials say. https://t.co/f5xoZuDDQo pic.twitter.com/2db4jzSdEZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据消息人士和官员称，一枚俄罗斯导弹周三早些时候在乌克兰港口城市敖德萨爆炸，爆炸地点距离沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基总统与希腊总理基里亚科斯-米佐塔基斯会面的地点仅数百英尺。
item.description:
A Russian missile exploded in the Ukrainian port city of Odesa early Wednesday, just hundreds of feet from where President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was meeting with Greek Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis, according to sources and officials. https://t.co/S3zMTQRYcM pic.twitter.com/5XTOWoBqSx

item.title: 据阿拉斯加雪橇犬比赛官员称，一只 "愤怒的驼鹿 "缠住了他的雪橇犬队，一名五届艾迪塔罗德雪橇犬赛冠军被迫开枪射杀了这只 "愤怒的驼鹿"。

item.title: 伊丽莎白-楚尔科夫（Elizabeth Tsurkov）是普林斯顿大学政治学系的一名学生。将近一年前，当她在巴格达为论文进行实地考察时，在离开一家咖啡馆时遭到绑架。更多信息
item.description:
Elizabeth Tsurkov is a Princeton political science student. Nearly one year ago, when she was doing field studies in Baghdad for her dissertation, she was kidnapped while leaving a café.

Read more: https://t.co/x9cabFFWhH pic.twitter.com/rEpDrSRuOh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: "锈迹斑斑》的装甲师汉娜-古铁雷斯（Hannah Gutierrez）在摄影师哈丽娜-哈钦斯（Halyna Hutchins）拍摄现场被枪杀一案中被认定犯有过失杀人罪，她将面临 18 个月的监禁。陪审员认定她在此案中篡改证据的罪名不成立。
item.description:
"Rust" armorer Hannah Gutierrez has been found guilty of involuntary manslaughter in the fatal on-set shooting of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins. She faces up to 18 months in prison.

Jurors found her not guilty of tampering with evidence in the case. https://t.co/sSwx3Rmzzp pic.twitter.com/EBh0WScbf8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 本周四晚，拜登总统将走上演讲台，发表他的第三次国情咨文演讲，这对他来说是一个关键时刻--但他的政治前途可能并不取决于周四的演讲。
item.description:
On Thursday night, Pres. Biden will take the speaker’s dais and deliver his third State of the Union address at a pivotal moment for him — but his political future probably does not depend on Thursday’s speech. https://t.co/QRO7OS0xfc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据最新公布的起诉书，中国公民在加利福尼亚州被捕，并被指控涉嫌窃取谷歌人工智能项目的商业机密，同时秘密为两家位于中国的人工智能初创公司工作。
item.description:
Chinese national arrested in California and charged with allegedly stealing confidential trade secrets from Google's Artificial Intelligence program while secretly working for two AI startup companies based in China, according to newly unsealed indictment. https://t.co/R9tz8abvOE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据立法者提交给共和党州长罗恩-德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）的一项法案，佛罗里达州将禁止数千名无家可归者在公共场所扎营或露宿。

Florida will ban thousands of homeless people from setting up camp or sleeping on public property under a bill lawmakers sent to Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis, who supports the idea. https://t.co/9lX1f5Hh17

item.title: 最新消息：《铁锈》的装甲师汉娜-古铁雷斯（Hannah Gutierrez）因在拍摄现场枪杀摄影师哈丽娜-哈钦斯（Halyna Hutchins）而被认定犯有过失杀人罪。
